title: The police of Abakan took part in the "ABC of safety" for school-students (PHOTO) (The ...
text: ( Source : The Ministry of Internal Affairs of the Russian Federation ) Specialists of the Abakan Palace of Youth , together with law enforcement officers conducted for elementary school pupils of the city of Abakan an event ' ABC of safety'.
